app.short_description: Zenchimp - Sync users to Mailchimp, even without the 'Customer Lists' feature
app.long_description: Welcome Zenchimp Mailchimp Sync - Map chosen Zendesk fields to your Mailchimp fields. Then whenever you viewing a user or one of their tickets in Zendesk this app will show you whether their details are in sync. Wee which fields have changed and synchronise the data at the click of a button. Select which mailshots the user is eligable for at the click of a button too. This app appears on the user screen and also the ticket screen. This app is designed for people who do not have the 'Customer Lists' feature in Zendesk as the official Mailchimp app does require this.
app.name: Zenchimp
app.installation_instructions: Once installed you will be taken to the settings screen. Enter the details of your Mailchimp account to allow Zenchimp access to call the Mailchimp APIs. For the rest of the options you can choose the default options to get you started. Once you;re ready to get the most out of Zenchimp you can set up additional field mappings for your Zendesk User fields, Organisation fields, and even your Mailchimp only fields that do not have a corresponding field in Zendesk. There is a Zenchimp Setting Generator SPreadsheet packaged alongside this app to help you set this up with confidence.

mailchimp_api_key.label: Mailchimp API Key
mailchimp_api_key.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Click your name at the top --> Account --> Extras --> API Keys --> Your API Keys --> Create a key if you dont alreaady have one

mailchimp_datacentre_prefix.label: Mailchimp Datacentre Prefix
mailchimp_datacentre_prefix.helpText:
Login to Mailchimp -->
look for the subdomain in the url after login: XXXX.admin.mailchimp.com

mailchimp_list_id.label: Mailchimp Audience ID of the Audience to sync to
mailchimp_list_id.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Click 'Audience' (at top) --> Click 'Manage Audience' --> 'Settings' --> Scroll right to the bottom --> Look for 'Unique id for audience' --> It Should look something like: 865422fc09 For more help see this: Mailchimp article

mailchimp_merge_field_forename.label: Mailchimp Tag Name of First Name merge field
mailchimp_merge_field_forename.helpText:
Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields -->
Find Tag for First Name Field

mailchimp_merge_field_surname.label: Mailchimp Tag Name of Last Name name merge field
mailchimp_merge_field_surname.helpText:
Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields -->
Find Tag for Last Name Field

mailchimp_merge_field_customer_type.label: Mailchimp Tag Name of Customer Type merge field
mailchimp_merge_field_customer_type.helpText:
Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields -->
Find Tag for Customer Field (create drop down field if it doesn't exist and add ALL values you need)

mailchimp_merge_field_customer_type_defa.label: Mailchimp Value of Customer Type field for users not linked to an Orgnaisation
mailchimp_merge_field_customer_type_defa.helpText:
Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields -->
Choose Default Value for Customer Field for people not inheriting their Customer Type value from their linked Zendesk Organization

mailchimp_organisation_button_label.label: 'Organization' Button Label text
mailchimp_organisation_button_label.helpText: Label text to appear on Organisation button when choosing  Organisation branded emails

mailchimp_standard_button_label.label: 'Standard' Button Label text
mailchimp_standard_button_label.helpText: Label text to appear on Standard button when choosing Standard Default branded emails

mailchimp_organization_field_mappings.label: Zendesk <-> Mailchimp Field Mapping for Organization fields
mailchimp_organization_field_mappings.helpText:
Map Settings to link Zendesk Organisation Fields to Mailchimp List Fields
FORMAT: JS array of JSON objects. eg:
[ {field 1 mapping}, {field 2 mapping}, {field 3 mapping} ]

mailchimp_user_field_mappings.label: Zendesk <-> Mailchimp Field Mapping for User fields
mailchimp_user_field_mappings.helpText:
Map Settings to link Zendesk User Fields to Mailchimp List Fields
FORMAT: JS array of JSON objects. eg:
[ {field 1 mapping}, {field 2 mapping}, {field 3 mapping} ]

mailchimp_mailshot_only_field_mappings.label: Field Definitions for Mailchimp only fields
mailchimp_mailshot_only_field_mappings.helpText:
Define the Mailchimp only fields that dont exist in Zendesk
FORMAT: JS array of JSON objects. eg:
[ {field 1 mapping}, {field 2 mapping}, {field 3 mapping} ]

fetch.fail: Failed to fetch information from the server
